data.text: @queens_parents None of the masks stop COVID.  Let's start there.....
@queens_parents Wearing a mask is similar to seeing a therapist. It’s fine if it makes one feel better or used to work through a trauma. However, forcing others to see your therapist is a bit much
@jessdvd1 You had to wear one of these outdoors??

@queens_parents I wore one of these for my kids' soccer last year. And I was on the board of the soccer org. The person above me gave me side eye and said she didn't think the safety director would approve but IDGAF and he never said anything to me.
@queensmom123 I liken it to a mini-face shield - 5x more compact and 100% as useless!

@queens_parents I was telling my friends my daughter had to basically wear a upside down face shield yesterday 🤣
And we definitely go to same dance school https://t.co/VtzIvrzzdJ
@queens_parents If you can't find a clinical trial to support its use then it's just theater.
@queens_parents The idea is that it stops large respiratory droplets, which 24 months ago, we though were the primary driver of transmission.  At LEAST 12 months ago we knew that wasn't the case.
